-| diffsc(hs2, cfv(ccf, c0))

|- wceq(cfv(ccf, cfv(ccf, c0)), cfv(ccf, c0))
-| diffsc(hs1, cfv(ccf, c0))
-| diffsc(hs2, cfv(ccf, c0))

|- wceq(cfv(ccf, cfv(ccf, c0)), cfv(ccf, c0))
-| diffsc(hs2, cfv(ccf, c0))
|- wceq(cfv(ccf, cfv(ccf, c0)), cfv(ccf, c0))

comment: The cofinality function is idempotent. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Mar-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2013.)
